headline: Introducing CFSSL 1.2
keywords: TLS, CFSSL, Product News, SSL, Postgres, OCSP, Programming, Security
description: Continuing our commitment to high quality open-source software, we’re happy to announce release 1.2 of CFSSL, our TLS/PKI Swiss Army knife. We haven’t written much about CFSSL here since we originally open sourced the project in 2014, so we thought we’d provide an update.
